title: Store Error
body: How can I get in touch with Riot... As of now 3 weeks ago I got riot points because there was a deal for 10 keys and chest. After making my purchase it took my riot points but didnt give my items. Can Riot fix this or have I gave a free $20 for literally nothing?

replies.body: It sounds weird that your RP would be taken without receiving those items, and I'm thinking it may have been due to a delay.   If your content hasn't arrived yet,  our billing team can help you out with this!  Reach out with a [player support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), and we'll get this squared away for you asap!

Did you visit the Hextech Crafting Hub? You can do this by clicking the icon to the right of the Store icon. This is where all you keys and chests will be stored. If it's not there;


Get in touch with Riot’s [Billing & Store Support Centre](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=4584)


* The primary category is already chosen. 


 * Under the secondary select **Billing & Store.**


  * For the tertiary category select **RP Purchase Errors**
